description:
This object is my personal record in terms of size and works of post-processing. It is 3 degrees wide and luckily I have a 0.73X Reducer to frame this object inside of the sensor chip. The post-processing had some challenges. Tried three ways PixelMath/Photoshop channels/(Photoshop Clipping layer mask method)  to mix HOO, and finally, I like the Photoshop Clipping layer method to change to Red and Blue colors for my taste. StarNet++ did a really good job to pull the Nebula out. 
-----------------------  
Spaghetti Nebula  (Simeis 147 / Sh2-240) 
Spaghetti Nebula is a supernova remnant in the Milky Way and covers nearly 3 degrees or 6 full moons in the sky crossing the border between the constellations Auriga and Taurus with an almost spherical shell and filamentary structure. The remnant has an estimated distance of approximately 3000 (Â±350) light-years and an age of approximately 40,000 years.
Simeis 147 was discovered by the Crimean Astrophysical Observatory using a 25-inch Schmidt-Cassegrain telescope in 1952. It is difficult to observe due to its extremely low brightness.
This image data (nebula) were taken through two narrow-band filters (Ha, OIII) and the stars were taken by board band filter (RGB).


Filters: Astrodon 50mm Unmounted LRGB Gen2 E-Series Filter Sets
         Astrodon 50mm Unmounted 3nm Narrowband Ha, SII, OIII filters
Blue   42x60"   42 Minutes   Bin1x1 01/08/2020 ~ 01/19/2021
Green  42x60"   42 Minutes   Bin1x1 01/08/2020 ~ 01/19/2021
Red    42x60"   42 Minutes   Bin1x1 01/08/2020 ~ 01/19/2021
Ha     41x900"  10.25 Hours  Bin1x1 01/08/2020 ~ 01/16/2021
Ha     39x1200" 13 Hours     Bin1x1 01/16/2020 ~ 01/21/2021
OIII   39x900"  9.75 Hours   Bin1x1 01/08/2020 ~ 01/16/2021
OIII   34x1200" 11.3 Hours   Bin1x1 01/16/2020 ~ 01/21/2021 

Technical details:
Telescope: Takahashi FSQ-106EDX4 
Reducer: Takahashi 0.73X Reducer Corrector f/3.6
Telescope Mount: Ioptorn CEM40EC
Image Camera: ZWO ASI6200MM
Software: PHD2, PixInsight, Lightroom 6.4, Sequence Generator Pro, Photoshop CS6, StarNet++, Topaz Lab DeNoiseAI
Location: Palo Alto, California, USA

PhotometricColorCalibration data:

Observation start time ... 2021-01-08 04:57:48 UTC
Observation end time ..... 2021-01-21 10:47:21 UTC
Focal distance ........... 388.47 mm
Pixel size ............... 3.76 um
Field of view ............ 5d 14' 36.1" x 3d 27' 47.6"
Image center ............. RA:  5 40 07.311  Dec: +28 02 02.47
Image bounds:
   top-left .............. RA:  5 28 23.388  Dec: +26 17 20.70
   top-right ............. RA:  5 51 44.932  Dec: +26 15 25.11
   bottom-left ........... RA:  5 28 06.689  Dec: +29 44 52.32
   bottom-right .......... RA:  5 52 14.004  Dec: +29 42 52.74
title: Spaghetti Nebula  (Simeis 147 / Sh2-240)  HOO + RGB stars
